title: Traits and Features
content: One of the nine Eldritch Invocations available at Warlock level 2. Warlock Lvl 2 Mask of Many Faces Feature You can cast Disguise Self at will, without expending a spell slot. One of the nine Eldritch Invocations available at Warlock level 2. Warlock Lvl 2 One with Shadows Feature Vanish into the darkness and become Invisible.
